root.name: Magic the Gathering: Duels of the Planeswalkers
root.description: With the easy to use tutorial, Duels of the Planeswalkers is the best way for new players to learn how to play the Magic: The Gathering trading card game. Players already familiar with Magic will enjoy a new-to-digital multiplayer game mode called Planechase. Planechase simulates the Planeswalkers' battle across the Multiverse using oversized Planar and Phenomenon cards to modify the rules of gameplay.
